entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3 except 9 inland.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3 except 9 inland. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2 except 6 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2 except 6 inland. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
